mods.abstract: Two color window card (red and black on white) announcing Skeeter Davis at the Tombstone Junction on October 3. Poster features a metal photoplate of Skeeter Davis. For additional information about this poster see https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/22943.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
